title: Installation issue: paraview (spec conflict )
body:
Hello,
I notice spec conflicts with binutils (which is needed with +plugins for LLVM but -plugins for somewhere else) in the paraview build.

I have seen that a modifcation of the binutils variants last week breaks some installations (#23112), maybe this one too ?
 I'm sorry , i have not found how to know who needs the "-plugins" variant (is there a command to do this ?). 

@chuckatkins  @danlipsa, @vicentebolea  can you take a look ?

### Steps to reproduce the issue

With a fresh clone of spack a simple ```spack spec paraview```  will reproduce my issue.

### Information on your system
```
$ spack spec paraview
Input spec
--------------------------------
paraview

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    binutils@2.36.1%gcc@9.3.0~gas+gold~headers~interwork~ld~libiberty~lto+nls~plugins arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^gettext@0.21%gcc@9.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@9.3.0+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@9.3.0~python arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^pkgconf@1.7.4%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@9.3.0~pic arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@9.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@9.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^tar@1.34%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    llvm@12.0.0%gcc@9.3.0~all_targets+clang~code_signing+compiler-rt~cuda~flang+gold+internal_unwind~ipo+libcxx+lld+lldb~llvm_dylib~mlir~omp_debug~omp_tsan+polly~python~shared_libs~split_dwarf build_type=Release cuda_arch=none arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^cmake@3.20.1%gcc@9.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@9.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^pkgconf@1.7.4%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^openssl@1.1.1k%gcc@9.3.0~docs+systemcerts arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^perl@5.32.1%gcc@9.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                    ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@9.3.0+cxx~docs+stl arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                    ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                        ^readline@8.1%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@9.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^hwloc@2.4.1%gcc@9.3.0~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^libpciaccess
                ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                    ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@9.3.0+sigsegv arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                        ^libsigsegv@2.13%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@9.3.0~python arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@9.3.0~pic arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^libedit@3.1-20210216%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^perl-data-dumper@2.173%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^python@3.8.9%gcc@9.3.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@9.3.0+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^expat@2.3.0%gcc@9.3.0+libbsd arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^libbsd@0.11.3%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                    ^libmd@1.0.3%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^gettext@0.21%gcc@9.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
                ^tar@1.34%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^libffi@3.3%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^sqlite@3.35.4%gcc@9.3.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
            ^util-linux-uuid@2.36.2%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
        ^swig
            ^pcre
        ^z3


llvm requires binutils variant +plugins, but spec asked for ~plugins

```


### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [ ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
